mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TAG_ITEM (TAG_SEQ,ITEM_SEQ) VALUES ( (SELECT TAG_SEQ FROM TAG WHERE TAG_NAME LIKE #{tagName}), #{itemSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TASTE WHERE FLAG LIKE 'STAR' AND MEMBER_ID LIKE #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_SEQ NOT IN ( SELECT item_seq FROM TASTE WHERE FLAG LIKE 'STAR' AND MEMBER_ID LIKE #{id} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASTE (GRADE, FLAG, MEMBER_ID, ITEM_SEQ) VALUES (#{grade} , 'star', #{id}, #{itemSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.avg DESC) as no,A.* FROM (SELECT it.*,im.img,ROUND(AVG(t.grade),2) AS avg FROM ITEM it JOIN IMAGE im ON it.item_seq like im.item_seq JOIN TASTE t ON it.item_seq like t.item_seq WHERE T.FLAG LIKE 'STAR' GROUP BY it.item_seq) A) B WHERE NO <= 20 ORDER BY NO

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.SUM DESC) as no,A.* FROM (SELECT it.*,im.img,SUM(t.QUANTITY) AS SUM FROM ITEM it JOIN IMAGE im ON it.item_seq like im.item_seq JOIN TASTE t ON it.item_seq like t.item_seq WHERE T.FLAG LIKE 'BUY' GROUP BY it.item_seq) A) B WHERE NO <= 20 ORDER BY NO

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.COUNT DESC) as no,A.* FROM (SELECT it.*,im.img,COUNT(t.TASTE_SEQ) AS COUNT FROM ITEM it JOIN IMAGE im ON it.item_seq like im.item_seq JOIN TASTE t ON it.item_seq like t.item_seq WHERE T.FLAG LIKE 'WISH' GROUP BY it.item_seq) A) B WHERE NO <= 20 ORDER BY NO
